actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to continue for 3 years the construction grants program of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to authorize the appropriation of $4,500,000,000 for each of fiscal years 1977, 1978, and 1979, for grants for the construction of waste treatment works. Specifies a formula for the allotment of such funds to the States. Authorizes additional appropriations to insure that States and territories meet specified minimum funding levels.

titles.title: A bill to continue for 3 years the construction grants program of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act.
